plot: An all-access look at Michael Bay's trip to Tokyo for the world premiere of "Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen" while still trying to finish the movie.
title: A Day with Bay: Tokyo
plot_es: An all-access look at Michael Bay's trip to Tokyo for the world premiere of "Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen" while still trying to finish the movie.
plot_en: An all-access look at Michael Bay's trip to Tokyo for the world premiere of "Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen" while still trying to finish the movie.
